article_title: McDermott Will & Emery Launches Health Care Lobbying Arm
article_text:
McDermott Will & Emery Launches Health Care Lobbying Arm

Law360, Washington (April 2, 2014, 7:04 PM ET) -- McDermott Will & Emery LLP announced Wednesday that it has launched a new lobbying and consultancy firm focusing on helping the health care industry deal with the Affordable Care Act and other legislative challenges, the law firm's first industry-specific lobbying arm.



The new subsidiary, known as McDermott+Consulting, or McDermottPlus, was created after the firm recognized that the health care industry faces mounting regulatory and fiscal challenges, the firm said. The new unit will serve a wide range of participants in the industry through lobbying and data...

To view the full article, register now.
